short_description: 【Wide View, Safer Drive】LivTee blind spot mirrors provide a wider field of view, effectively eliminating blind spots and helping you avoid potential accidents when changing lanes, merging, or reversing. Drive with greater confidence and safety every day.

name: Utopicar Long Blind Spot Car Mirror Aesthetic Convex Mirrors - Side Mirror Engineered Design - Up & Down Adjustable - Blind Spot Rear View Mirrors for Car (2-Pack)
short_description: ENGINEERED DESIGN: Don’t just use any fisheye mirror for your rear view. Utopicar offers you not just a typical car mirror (blindspot mirror), but one that is engineered to cover a wider area. See better with the larger images this mirror reflects.

OUTDOOR-RATED ADHESIVE: You know how important a blindspot mirror for car is. Our product comes with an outdoor-rated adhesive base so your convex mirror car won't fall during cold weather, car wash, or exposure to salt water.

LONG DESIGN: Looking for a stylish yet still efficient side view mirror (blindspot)? Utopicar made this blind spot mirror for car longer sideways to show more of the next lane and not so much of the sky or the sun. It’s also adjustable up and down.

SAFETY FIRST: Utopicar promotes safe driving through its cutting-edge rear view mirror. Feel more confident in changing lanes using this product instead of a fish eye mirror. It’s a cheaper yet efficient alternative to a blind spot monitor.

FOR SPORTS CAR & MUSCLE CARS: This 5.3” x 1.3” long blindspot mirror is ideal for your sports car and other show cars because of its sleek and stylish design. But if you want a blind spot mirror for truck, Utopicar also offers that.
